RecurrenceSchedule.name: RecurrenceSchedule
RecurrenceSchedule.description: Represents the recurrence schedule for a benefit schedule.

CompletedScheduleCount.description: The number of times the schedule was completed.

EndDate.description: The date when the schedule ends.

Name.description: The name of the recurrence schedule.

NextScheduleDateTime.description: The date and time when the schedule is executed next.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the object.

ProcessName.description: The name of the scheduling process that executes the request.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The related record for which youâ€™re creating the recurrence schedule. For example, creating a recurrence schedule for a related Benefit Schedule entity.

ScheduleDayValue.description: The days in a week when the schedule is executed. This field contains a bit mask. Monday = 64 Tuesday = 32 Wednesday = 16 Thursday = 8 Friday = 4 Saturday = 2 Sunday = 1

ScheduleFrequency.description: Specifies the frequency at which the schedule is executed.

StartDate.description: The date when the schedule begins.

TotalRecurrencesCount.description: The number of times the schedule is executed.
